attributes.action: give a tax-free bonus to all NHS Staff and key workers who sacrifice all for UK
attributes.additional_details: All frontline staff are exposing themselves to the virus and prone to be infected through every means. For instance those who lost their lives via care provided for covid patients knew the danger but didn’t have the option of not doing it. Also despite the fact that we know the risks, our caring act has kept us going irrespective of the outcome. Hence we deserve a pay boost to compensate and encourage us.
attributes.background: The Government should give a tax-free bonus to all NHS staff and Key worker who has put their life and families at risk to fight Covid-19.
